page.shortlink: api field object is valid function
page.discussion: The .IS_VALID() method returns .T. (TRUE) if the pointer to the field is valid; otherwise, it returns .F. (FALSE). The method always returns .F. (FALSE) once the table is closed. Note : The only way to retrieve an invalid field is to use TABLE.FIELD_GET(Field_Number).
page.example:
dim tbl as P dim fld as P tbl = table.open("customer")
fld = tbl.field_get(1) ? fld.is_valid() = .T.
fld = tbl.field_get(27) ? fld.is_valid() = .F.
tbl.close()
? fld.is_valid(1) = .F.
